encounter_type.name: Discharge
encounter_type.description: Indicates that a patient's inpatient care at the hospital is ending, and they are expected to leave soon.

encounter_type.name: Admission
encounter_type.description: Indicates that the patient has been admitted for inpatient care, and is not expected to leave the hospital unless discharged.

encounter_type.name: Visit Note
encounter_type.description: Encounter where a full or abbreviated examination is done, usually leading to a presumptive or confirmed diagnosis, recorded by the examining clinician.

encounter_type.name: Check Out
encounter_type.description: The patient is explicitly leaving the hospital/clinic. (Usually no formal encounter is captured for this.)

encounter_type.name: Check In
encounter_type.description: Indicates the patient has done the required paperwork and check-in to begin a visit to the clinic/hospital.

encounter_type.name: Transfer
encounter_type.description: Indicates that a patient is being transferred into a different department within the hospital. (Transfers out of the hospital should not use this encounter type.)

encounter_type.name: Vitals
encounter_type.description: For capturing vital signs

encounter_type.name: ANC - Encounter
encounter_type.description: An encounter when a patient gets ANC services

encounter_type.name: LAB Encounter
encounter_type.description: Lab Encounter

encounter_type.name: SMC - Encounter
encounter_type.description: An encounter when a patient gets SMC services

encounter_type.name: HTC - Encounter
encounter_type.description: An encounter when a patient gets HCT services

encounter_type.name: EID Card - Encounter
encounter_type.description: Outpatient Child Return Visit

encounter_type.name: ART Card - Health Education Encounter
encounter_type.description: An Health education encounter created when a patient gets health education

encounter_type.name: ART Card - Summary
encounter_type.description: Outpatient Adult Initial Visit

encounter_type.name: ART Card - Encounter
encounter_type.description: Outpatient Adult & Child Return Visit

encounter_type.name: EID Card - Summary
encounter_type.description: Outpatient Children Initial Visit

encounter_type.name: Maternity - Encounter
encounter_type.description: When a mother comes to a health facility to deliver

encounter_type.name: PNC - Encounter
encounter_type.description: An encounter when a patient gets PNC services

encounter_type.name: SMC FOLLOW UP - Encounter
encounter_type.description: An encounter for SMC Follow up

encounter_type.name: OPD Encounter
encounter_type.description: Outpatient Clinical Ecnounter

encounter_type.name: TB Summary (Enrollment)
encounter_type.description: An encounter for the initial visit to the TB clinic

encounter_type.name: Viral Load Non Suppressed Encounter
encounter_type.description: Viral Load Non Suppressed Follow up

encounter_type.name: Appointment Follow-up
encounter_type.description: Followup actions for patients especially after missing a facility visit

encounter_type.name: Viral Load Lab Request
encounter_type.description: Lab Request for Viral Load Analysis

encounter_type.name: Triage
encounter_type.description: This is a form to capture information on triage. It include Vitals, global security indicators etc....
